creator: rechegaray@cumorahenterprises.com
text:
After setting the name, value, domain and path I run my test but the view 
results tree for the http request shows Cookie Data:null.  I tried to setup 
the cookie using the HTTP Header Manager with the following values: Name:Set-
Cookie Value: mail=roberto@yahoo.com but I got the same results.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The Header Manager is intended for non-cookie headers - try using the Cookie
Manager instead. Also check jmeter.log for errors.

1.9.1 is a bit old now - there have been many improvements since then, including
some in the area of Cookie handling, so it would be worth trying the current
version, which is 2.0.1.

Are "=" signs allowed in cookie values?
